misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: A mainstay of the Hector Trophée, Marcus of Kurk Golf makes his fifth consecutive appearance in this year’s tournament.  A consistently strong performer, he has yet to claim victory in either the coveted Hector Trophée itself or the individual Victor trophy, but his dedication and skill are undeniable. This year, all eyes will be on Marcus to see if he can finally break through and claim the title.

Adding an interesting layer to Marcus’s golfing persona is his occasional competition under the alias of "Eva." While the reasons behind this remain a fascinating mystery, his performances as both Marcus and Eva are equally noteworthy.  This duality showcases an impressive range and adaptability, making him a compelling competitor to watch on the course.

With four previous appearances under his belt,  Marcus brings a wealth of experience to this year’s event. His familiarity with the Hector Trophée’s unique challenges is a considerable asset, and coupled with his talent and strategic prowess, he’s sure to be a formidable contender once again.  Whether competing as Marcus or Eva, his consistent presence and dedication place him among the elite at this prestigious invitational.
